about.description:
Hello, my name is Monte.

I'm a Web Developer with a passion for front-end technologies. I love learning and building cool things. Right now, some of my interests are React-Redux, ES6, Webpack, NodeJS, and Angular.

When not coding, I can be found performing on the stages of Lincoln Center and Carnegie Hall (and occasionally a Broadway pit) as a classical musician. I'm also a voracious reader of fiction, and a not-very-good surfer.

contact.heading: Want to work together?
contact.text: I am currently accepting new offers and would love to hear about yours. Please take a moment to tell me about it.
